text: Dietmar Berchtold (born 6 August 1974) is an Austrian football midfielder. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:People from Bludenz Category:Austrian footballers Category:Wiener Sport-Club players Category:SK Vorwärts Steyr players Category:LASK players Category:SV Waldhof Mannheim players Category:PAOK FC players Category:Apollon Smyrnis F.C. players Category:Alemannia Aachen players Category:VfL Bochum players Category:SW Bregenz players Category:SV Ried players Category:SC Austria Lustenau players Category:FC Farul Constanța players Category:Grazer AK players Category:2.
